summary:
This mod adds the Enkindled Alpha Wolf animal follower.
*-*Requires No DLC*-* 
*-*Works with Dawnguard DLC*-* 
*-*Works with Hearthfire DLC*-* 
*-*Works with Dragonborn DLC*-*
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds the Enkindled Alpha Wolf animal follower.  Be sure and check out the new video [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AW_19T61J_w&feature=youtu.be]here![/url]


*-*Requires No DLC*-* 
*-*Works with Dawnguard DLC*-*
*-*Works with Hearthfire DLC*-*
*-*Works with Dragonborn DLC*-*

There is a new breed of wolf in the land of Skyrim. The Enkindled Wolf. 

The Enkindled Wolves have been spotted in the cliffs south of Whiterun. They have taken up residence in a large cave along the river now being referred to as the Enkindled Wolf Den. 

Legend has it that if an adventurer is strong enough to destroy the pack, the pack\'s Alpha will follow their command. 


[b][u]Other Information[/b][/u] 

The Enkindled Wolf Den Can be found north of Riverwood along the river and South of Whiterun (see images).

Defeat the pack of Enkindled Wolves and make your way inside. There you will find the Enkindled Alpha Wolf. Once his pack has been defeated he will follow you. 

The Enkindled Alpha Wolf will fight for you and is essential so he cannot die. If sent away he will return to his location inside the Enkindled Wolf Den. 

The Enkindled Alpha Wolf has attacks similar to a Flame Atronach and will burn near by enemies. 

This follower works in the same way as \"Stray Dogs\". Activate once and the Enkindled Alpha Wolf will begin following you. Activate again for Follow/Wait/Dismiss options. 


**Known Bug** Sometimes after combat Enkindled Alpha Wolf will not speak when activated. Fast travel to resolve this issue. 

 
[b][u]Version Information[/b][/u] 

Beta - Please report any bugs!
author: KahjiitRaj
